en.title: FE Grows In India!
en.content:
REPORT BY FE PRESIDENTIAL DIRECTOR DATO' DR.BARANI KARUNAKARAN.

We are extremely happy to announce FE's event at Beed Maharashtra, India ! The event was held at Vishal International Hotel and a great headstart for the Indian market. 

DR.Bangar did all the necessary arrangements beforehand for this seminar and he published some articles about scalar energy in the local newspapers. Everyone was excited to learn more at the seminar. 

Guest of honour was our international upline Presidential Director Dato' Dr Barani and his father Presidential Director Uncle Karuna who made the effort to be at Beed, all the way from Malaysia! 

The seminar was conducted by Dr Barani and the response was great. There were more than 120 participants including well known doctors from the city –Dr Pakhare ( leading opthalmologist ), Dr Dabhade ( opthalmologist medical officer), Dr Bangar ( medical officer), Dr Khose ( MD ). All of them shared their personal testimonies regarding FE's QP. Journalists who were present took note and were very impressed. 

People were thrilled to see the demos, especially the mobile phone test, the flame test and the energized water test. This seminar has given us a great headstart . We will boom the Indian market in the months to come !!! A very sincere thanks to FusionExcel ! AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!!
